identity.name: PsyTech
identity.mission: Transforming mental health assessment with AI-driven precision and empathy.
identity.tone: Professional, Scientific, Trustworthy, Minimal, Modern, European
identity.archetype: Swiss & High-Contrast (Clarity/Science) mixed with Organic & Earthy (Trust)

colors.theme_strategy: Mixed: Dark Hero (#0F172A / #020617) + Light Content Sections (#F8FAFC)

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Features, Mode B for Data)

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-cyan-700 text-white hover:bg-cyan-800 shadow-lg shadow-cyan-900/20 transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: rounded-full bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 transition-all duration-300

cards.feature: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1
cards.dark: bg-slate-800/50 border border-slate-700/50 rounded-2xl p-8 backdrop-blur-sm

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500/20 focus:border-cyan-500 transition-all

hero_bg.usage: Hero background with heavy dark overlay (opacity 90%) to make text pop. Use as texture.

solution_demo.usage: Solution section, showing the tool in action.

how_it_works.usage: How it works section, focusing on precision.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Mixed Theme': Dark Hero Section (Slate-900) -> Light Content Sections (Slate-50).
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings to give a modern tech feel.
Use 'DM Sans' for body text for high readability.
The 'Contact Form' must be detailed with a 'Company Type' selector (Clinic, University, Corporate, etc.).
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the 'Key Benefits' section.
Ensure the 'Team Section' uses placeholder avatars (e.g., initials or generic silhouettes) as requested.
Add a 'GDPR/Privacy' badge or section in the footer or near the CTA to address the European market constraint.
Do NOT use gradients on text. Keep text solid Slate-900 or White for maximum trust/legibility.
Add a subtle 'Noise' overlay to the entire page for a premium 'paper-like' feel.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
